verses.verse: Now when <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> had <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> he <S%H6950>assembled<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> 180000 <S%H977>chosen<s%> men who were <S%H4421>warriors,<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H7725>restore<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> to <S%H7346>Rehoboam.<s%>
But the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H559>"Speak<s%> to <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "You shall not <S%H5927>go<s%> up or <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> your <S%H251>relatives;<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H1004>house,<s%> for <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> is from Me."' "So they <S%H8085>listened<s%> to the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> from <S%H1980>going<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H3379>Jeroboam.<s%>
<S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> for <S%H4692>defense<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>
Thus he <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H1035>Bethlehem,<s%> <S%H5862>Etam,<s%> <S%H8620>Tekoa,<s%>
Beth-zur, <S%H7755>Soco,<s%> <S%H5725>Adullam,<s%>
<S%H1661>Gath,<s%> <S%H4762>Mareshah,<s%> <S%H2128>Ziph,<s%>
<S%H115>Adoraim,<s%> <S%H3923>Lachish,<s%> <S%H5825>Azekah,<s%>
<S%H6881>Zorah,<s%> <S%H357>Aijalon,<s%> and <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H4694>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and in <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>
He also <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> the <S%H4694>fortresses<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H5057>officers<s%> in them and <S%H214>stores<s%> of <S%H3978>food,<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> and <S%H3196>wine.<s%>

And [he put] <S%H6793>shields<s%> and <S%H7420>spears<s%> in <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> and <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> them <S%H7235>greatly.<s%> <S%H3966><s%> So he <S%H1961>held<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>

Moreover, the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3320>stood<s%> with him from <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H1366>districts.<s%>

For the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H5800>left<s%> their <S%H4054>pasture<s%> <S%H4054>lands<s%> and their <S%H272>property<s%> and <S%H1980>came<s%> to <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> for <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> had <S%H2186>excluded<s%> them from <S%H3547>serving<s%> as <S%H3547>priests<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

And he <S%H5975>set<s%> up <S%H3548>priests<s%> of his own for the <S%H1116>high<s%> <S%H1116>places,<s%> for the <S%H9618>satyrs,<s%> and for the <S%H5695>calves<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H6213>made.<s%>

And those from <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> who <S%H5414>set<s%> their <S%H3824>hearts<s%> on <S%H1245>seeking<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H935>followed<s%> them to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of their fathers.

And they <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> the <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H553>supported<s%> <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> for <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> for they <S%H1980>walked<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> and <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> for <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

Then <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> as a <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H4258>Mahalath<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3406>Jerimoth<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> [and of] <S%H32>Abihail<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H446>Eliab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse,<s%>
and she <S%H3205>bore<s%> him <S%H1121>sons:<s%> <S%H3266>Jeush,<s%> <S%H8114>Shemariah,<s%> and <S%H2093>Zaham.<s%>

And <S%H310>after<s%> her he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H4601>Maacah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H53>Absalom,<s%> and she <S%H3205>bore<s%> him <S%H29>Abijah,<s%> <S%H6262>Attai,<s%> <S%H2124>Ziza,<s%> and <S%H8019>Shelomith.<s%>

And <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H4601>Maacah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his [other] <S%H802>wives<s%> and <S%H6370>concubines.<s%> For he had <S%H5375>taken<s%> <S%H8083>eighteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> and <S%H8346>sixty<s%> <S%H6370>concubines<s%> and <S%H3205>fathered<s%> twenty-eight <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H8346>sixty<s%> <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>

And <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H5975>appointed<s%> <S%H29>Abijah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4601>Maacah<s%> as <S%H7218>head<s%> and <S%H5057>leader<s%> among his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> for he [intended] to <S%H4427>make<s%> him <S%H4427>king.<s%>

And he <S%H995>acted<s%> <S%H995>wisely<s%> and <S%H6555>distributed<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H6555>through<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>territories<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4694>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and he <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H4202>food<s%> in <S%H7230>abundance.<s%> And he <S%H7592>sought<s%> <S%H1995>many<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> [for them.]
